short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run internet speed tests via a widget on your toolbar using the Speed Test Meter extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Conveniently test the quality of your internet connection with this easy-to-use internet speed test tool. Monitor your upload and download speeds, ping and jitter times, and view your current ISP and IP address.

How to use the speed test tool:
1. Click the puzzle icon on the toolbar, then click on Speed Test Meter to access the widget
2. Click ‘Check speed’ to run an internet speed test
3. View your current download and upload speeds, ping and jitter times, along with information on your ISP provider and IP address

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you:
https://speedtestmeter.com/static/contactus_cc.html

You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here: https://speedtestmeter.com/static/uninstall_cc.html
